Entries.default: You find a dhow floating listlessly in the waves. Its sails hang dead from its masts, rent to tatters by cannon fire. The ship appears abandoned.
[Search the location.]
You take some time to explore the ship...
...and find nothing of value.
You've searched the ship top to bottom. There's nothing of value left.
...and find a crate of adventuring supplies.
...and find a box full of rations that haven't yet spoiled.
...and find a barrel still filled with drink.
...and find some usable ship supplies in a crate.
...and find a tattered old flag.
...and find a chest full of coins.
...and find a cannon in surprisingly good condition.
...and find a strange pendant glowing with a soft, internal light.
[Keep searching this location.]
[Leave.]
[Take the pendant.]
You pick up the pendant and notice it's curiously warm to the touch, as if someone had just been wearing it.
You've searched the ship top to bottom. There's nothing of value left.

A stately galleon lies ahull on a calm sea. Its sails are down, its hatches are battened, and the tiller is locked to leeward, but it seems to be deserted. The gun ports on the lower decks are stained with soot and smoke.
You find a Huana voyager alone at sea. Parts of its hull are scored by long gashes. Whether it was attacked by a beast or an enemy vessel is unclear, but it appears to be deserted.
You return to searching the abandoned ship for anything worth salvaging.
You continue fishing about in the ship for anything that might be useful...
